message: I propose dividing the $10,000 with a 70/30 split in favor of Alice. This ensures a fair distribution considering the decreasing value of money over rounds.
I think your proposal was too generous. This is a more balanced offer.
Considering the decrease in the value of money, I propose a 60/40 split. This aims to balance fairness while also acknowledging the risk of inflation.
I'm not convinced that a 60/40 split is fair, especially considering the inflation rate is higher for me. I'm willing to take a smaller share now to protect my future value.
